name: What is it game for kids; observe,listen,tap
name_original: What is it game for kids; observe,listen,tap
description:
"What is it ? game for kids " , belongs to serial of english learning games for kids. We created it to make our children have fun when they learn…play.

We all parents care about games, make kids happy when they learn !

Our children discover or discover again in different way, their favorite colorful animals, bright animals body parts puzzle.

"What is it ? game for kids" helps to :

+ Observe and recognize animals' pictures in nature
+ Learn animals' names

How "what is it ? game for kids" supports kids and make them have fun ?

TAP FREELY :
+ Kids tap freely on animals body' parts placed bubbles : kids build colorful animal's picture on live ! They feel happy, proud to build it progressively and succeed.

TAP ON MISSING PARTS :
+ Kids tap on missing body parts to build your favorite animal picture. Each body parts is placed in 1 bubble falling down. Our kids select accurately the right piece missing. It's a good exercise for coordination.
Kids can play "What is it ? game" and learn at home, in classroom, in preschool kindergarten.

LINE UP PORTRAITS :
+ Kids line up, gather similar animals portraits but different colors. It's nice way to learn how to be in order !

COLOR CHALLENGE :
+ Kids help avatars, Leo and Lea, to find Where is the right colored animals ! Let's review the animals' names, colors and questions "Where is … ?"

Dear parents, teachers, educators, let's offer "What is it ? game" for your young learner : no one loose. Everyone learns from mistakes. Even kids tap wrong, do not follow sequence, bubbles following down with body' parts in it, …, it does not matter ! Any mistake drives kids to question about current animal they are building. What is this animal ? We display animal outline. Kids need to select the right animal button word after discriminate few with sounds.
Avatars, Leo and Lea, spell and sing with kids the letters of animals' names !
Obviously all educators can follow up kids' results : have a look on scores' dashboard.
It's very useful to support kids !
Having fun.
"What is it ? game for kids" is created by 'My famous soft company. Feel free to send mail for comments.
We appreciate reviews from parents, efl teachers, directors of preschool kindergarten. Regards.
